pullrequest.title: Added battery element (contribution from Olivier Crave)

content.raw: Sorry, I approved this and then unapproved it... After going through the gazebo pull request I'm not as sold on the idea of having a battery within a link anymore. Is there a reason to have it within a link instead of a model?
content.html: Sorry, I approved this and then unapproved it... After going through the gazebo pull request I'm not as sold on the idea of having a battery within a link anymore. Is there a reason to have it within a link instead of a model?
